column1:
learned  Counsel 
for  the  appellant  confined  his  arguments  to  the
following three grounds at the hearing of the appeal.

I. 
The  learned  High  Court  Judge  rejected  the  defence  of  alibi  on

II. 
The learned High Court Judge has relied on testimony not given
in arriving at the finding of guilt.

III. 
The learned High Court Judge has failed to evaluate the evidence
in its totality with specific regard to the contradictions both inter
se and per se of the witnesses.
